server_configuration.name: BICSCAN_API_KEY
server_configuration.description: Your BICScan API key obtained from https://bicscan.io

tools.name: get_risk_score
tools.description: Assess risk scores for crypto addresses, domains, ENS, CNS, KNS, or hostnames using BICScan MCP Server. Scores range from 0 to 100, with 100 indicating high risk. Input an address to evaluate potential security threats.
tools.instructions:
Get Risk Score for Crypto, Domain Name, ENS, CNS, KNS or even Hostname AddressArgs:
    address: EOA, CA, ENS, CNS, KNS or even HostName
Returns:
    Dict: where summary.bicscan_score is from 0 to 100. 100 is high risk.

tools.name: get_assets
tools.description: Retrieve comprehensive asset holdings linked to a crypto address using the BICScan MCP Server. Input an EOA, CA, ENS, CNS, or KNS address to receive a detailed list of assets.
tools.instructions:
Get Assets holdings by CryptoAddressArgs:
    address: EOA, CA, ENS, CNS, KNS.
Returns:
    Dict: where assets is a list of assets
